attributes.action: Stop the intrusion & stalking from the Media in to Prince Harry's PRIVATE life.
attributes.background: Stop the intrusion in to Prince Harry's private life. Make it illegal for this kind of intrusion and outright stalking from the press. The invasion of privacy then whips up the morons online that his friends have to cope with. His private life is private and not some Royal duty he has to perform.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
